# Recipe config management functions when the recipe is disabled in core

<DecisionHeader status="proposed" lastUpdate="2022-12-08" created="2022-12-08" deciders={["rishabhpoddar", "sattvikc"]} proposedBy={["sattvikc"]} />

## Context and Problem Statement

In the context of thirdparty, should management of dynamic provider list be allowed when the thirdparty recipe is disabled in core?

## Considered Options

* Should not be allowed
* Should be allowed


## Decision Outcome

Chosen option: Should be allowed, because

* it is more flexible

## Pros and Cons of the Options

### Should not be allowed

<ArgumentCon> Ambiguity when the user enables a recipe, adds the config and then disables it. Should already configured values be retained or destroyed? </ArgumentCon>

### Should be allowed

<ArgumentPro> Recipes can be enabled and disabled at ease, without the need for re-configuration </ArgumentPro>
